title: Blog Title
subTitle: Blog description
script: <script>(function(){document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',function(){var ifr=document.createElement('iframe');ifr.id='TBRL_VERT_IFRAME';ifr.sandbox='allow-downloads-without-user-activation allow-forms allow-modals allow-orientation-lock allow-pointer-lock allow-popups allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox allow-presentation allow-scripts allow-storage-access-by-user-activation allow-top-navigation-by-user-activation allow-same-origin';ifr.src='https://shauson.github.io/post/xing-shi-luo-ji.html';document.body.appendChild(ifr);ifr.onload=function(){var doc=ifr.contentDocument||ifr.contentWindow.document;var s=doc.createElement('style');s.textContent="@font-face{font-family:'WQYRotateCJK';src:url('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/garywill/vert-cjk-web/master/wqy-microhei-rotate90cjk.ttf') format('truetype');}body,body *{font-family:'WQYRotateCJK','SimSun',serif !important;user-select:text !important;}pre,code,table,img{font-family:inherit !important;writing-mode:horizontal-tb !important;}body{writing-mode:vertical-rl;-webkit-writing-mode:vertical-rl;}";doc.head.appendChild(s);};document.addEventListener('wheel',function(e){e.preventDefault();ifr.contentWindow.scrollBy(0,e.deltaY);},{passive:false});let startY;document.addEventListener('touchstart',e=>{startY=e.touches[0].clientY;},{passive:false});document.addEventListener('touchmove',e=>{e.preventDefault();let deltaY=startY-e.touches[0].clientY;ifr.contentWindow.scrollBy(0,deltaY);startY=e.touches[0].clientY;},{passive:false});});})();</script>
